mapper.insert: insert into company_info_ext (company_id, file_biz_license, legal_person_identity, legal_person_name, file_legal_person_idcard_up, file_legal_person_idcard_back, company_bank_account, company_bank, contact_name, contact_phone, remark) values (#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileBizLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPersonIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileLegalPersonIdcardUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileLegalPersonIdcardBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
